channel.title: [Dev Team] remake11
channel.description:
intro. Hello my name is skylar, im 19 and i love coding, i love meeting new people. I have decided to remake the 2011 version. ive decided to remake this version because i thought it was the most enjoyable. it had newer grafix but not the eoc, it had a lot of great features and things to give to the players who played it.
i have been working on rsps for a bout 4 years now, server side and client side.
Goals Quests- new(custom) and old (favriots) i will be hosting polls once its open to see what quests you want to bring back and what quests you would like to see. Skills-Have all skills and there respective items working fully, Economy-have a stable econimy were items eventually will have there prices stabilized. Development-try to push at least 1 update wether it be content or bug fixes(hoping to be content) worlds- if we get enough players open up 2 worlds or more depending on ammount of players(Members, Free, and even PVP worlds) NO CUSTOM ITEMS- this server will and forever will be 100% custom item free, they just add clutter and confusion to the game, Areas-We have the entire MAP at our disposal so were dang well gonna use every square inch of it. Current Progress(Beta):
Accomplishments: drops mining smithing Woodcutting Fletching Combat Range Mage(working on staffs) cooking eating doors resource dungeons(Work In Progress im doing something different to integrate them into the game)
Towns compleated(5)
Al-khard - 90% -Shops 100% -hide tanner 100% -bank 100% -npcs-70% -kibba salsemen-100%
Lumbridge - 90% -Shops 100% -npcs 90% -bank( currently unaccessable because you cant climb the ladder fixing it though)
Varrock - 80% -Shops 100% -sewers 70%(one area is currupt and crashes the client) --Custom resource dungeon with a boss -bank 90% just need to add bankers -Npcs 90% coupe of guards need to be placed
Barb village - 95% -shops 100% -npcs 100% working on stronghold
falador - 90% -Shops 100% -npcs - 90% -Mine - 80% working on mining guild ( resource dungeon 100% 45 mining to enter. )
Listed Jobs Part-Time Programmer: 0/2 Client Side Programmer Specialist: 0/1 Hoster: 0/1(need a vps) Video Editor: 0/2 Moderator: 0/2 Head Admin: 1/1
Application Layout Code: [Select] Name: Age: Country & Timezone: Skype: Job: Experience: Why do you want this:
Pics:(taking them now)
My Contact Info Skype: skylarstruble Email: skylarstruble@gmail.com

Job: Head admin can code some things also good with forums and managing forums.
Experience: Made and managed a server called perfectscape.
Why do you want this: Looking for a new server to work on with someone as my last one perfectscape had to go down because of money problems.

Look forward to talking on skype.

intro.
Hello my name is skylar, im 19 and i love coding, i love meeting new people. I have decided to remake the 2011 version. ive decided to remake this version because i thought it was the most enjoyable. it had newer grafix but not the eoc, it had a lot of great features and things to give to the players who played it.

i have been working on rsps for a bout 4 years now, server side and client side.
